items.title: Backyard Nature Exploration
items.description: Create opportunities for discovery in your own outdoor space, no matter how small
tips: Set up a 'sit spot' for quiet observation
Create nature art with found materials
Start a nature journal or photo collection
Build with sticks, stones, and natural materials

items.title: Seasonal Nature Activities
items.description: Connect with the changing seasons through outdoor exploration
tips: Collect and press autumn leaves
Build snow sculptures and ice decorations
Plant seeds and watch them grow in spring
Create summer nature mandalas

items.title: Urban Nature Connections
items.description: Find nature opportunities in city environments
tips: Visit local parks and green spaces
Observe urban wildlife and birds
Explore community gardens
Take nature walks in your neighborhood

items.title: Understanding Big Emotions
items.description: Supporting children through challenging emotional moments
tips: Validate feelings before addressing behavior
Model emotional regulation yourself
Create calm-down spaces and strategies
Practice patience with the learning process

items.title: Building Independence
tips: Allow time for children to solve problems independently
Offer choices within appropriate boundaries
Support rather than rescue during challenges
Celebrate effort and growth over achievement
